name: Syed Hassan Ahmed
title: Data Scientist • Data Analyst • ServiceNow Developer • AR Developer • Researcher

about.headline: I am currently pursuing a Master’s degree in Data Science and actively seeking internship/part time/full time/contract opportunities to apply my skills and gain real-world experience. With a strong interest in data-driven insights and research-based problem solving, I enjoy working on projects that combine data science, software engineering, and applied analytics. I bring a balanced mix of technical skills and creative thinking to every project, whether it involves AI, machine learning, augmented reality, databases, or enterprise systems. I enjoy learning new technologies, taking on challenges, and explaining complex ideas in a clear and approachable way. Currently, I am focused on gaining practical experience through academic projects, research work, and community volunteering, while continuing to strengthen my skills in data science, analytics, database systems, cloud computing, and applied research.

education.school: University of St. Thomas, MN, USA

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science
education.school: Arya College of Engineering & I.T., RJ, India
